Room.Name: Marbella's Chambers
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the rather luxurious chambers of the great archmage Marbella.
Room.LongDescription: The magnificent decor of the room is composed mostly of gold and jewels with scattered pictures of the great wizard with such creatures as the great gold dragon, a massive cloud giant and other notable creatures of good will. Well hidden from the outside world, the archmage Lena Marbella can live in comfort without having to deal with the evil creatures lurking around every corner.
